item.description:
Information from one of the Berkman Blog Group organizers (not Sooz):

We're planning on joining a 7:30 pm presentation in the Ames Courtroom in Austin Hall about justice and prisons in Jamaica with Rubin "Hurricane" Carter.

The talk may end between 8:30 p and 9 p. Dinner could
follow.

Proposed agenda:
http://blogs.law.harv...

Meet at the Berkman Center at the usual time of 7pm.

The RSVP count does not include regulars from the Berkman Thursday Blog Group who may not be signed up at Meetup.com. There is usually a group of 10+ enjoying a lively discussion about blog related topics.

For more information, see http://blogs.law.harv...

group.name: The Greater Boston Area Weblogger Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Weblogger January Meetup
